# Oblivion (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* | The Confuser of Ways |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** Once per day, you may use the spell-like ability *sow doubt.* *Sow doubt* requires a touch attack against an opponent. The opponent is disoriented and must make a WIll save (DC 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wis modifier) to take any action. *Sow doubt* lasts for one round per your cleric level

**Oblivion Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Spellscatter (Spell)|Spellscatter]]** \[scalable]**:** Target loses 1d3 prepared spells.

**2 Hypnotic Panettern:** Fascinates 2d4+1 HD/level of creatures.

**3** **[[Bestow Curse (Spell)|Bestow Curse]]**** (reduce Intelligence only):** -6 to an ability; -4 on attacks, saves and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

**4** **[[Confusion (Spell)|Confusion]]****:** Makes subject behave oddly for 1 round/level

**5** **[[Feeblemind (Spell)|Feeblemind]]****:** Subject's Int drops to 1.

**6** **[[Mind Fog (Spell)|Mind Fog]]****:** Subjects in fog get -10 Wis, Will checks.

**7** **[[Mislead (Spell)|Mislead]]****:** Turns you invisible and crutes illusory double.

**8 Obscurity:** Makes the target unnoticeable.

**9 Amnesia:** A creature loses all memories, i.e. skills, feats and spells.

**Source:** Kingdoms of Kalamar Player's Guide (Kenzer and Company), pg. 155
